post.body: got your card yesterday. It looks great! Thanks again
Not sure. Not a bad idea, though. I think it would make a great 1st. Great course.
They did. Very cool.
you were the subject of a question on Cash Cab last night. Had to do with the design of the building.
batmobile is in the bat driveway. :)
nice mention in the WSJ today. Very cool.
I wish. As I get older the feeling that I am "floundering" gets stronger.
what's cool is I have talked to alexa on twitter. It is a good article
prolly a good idea. I think I will, as well.
it could be said that it's my inner likeness. :)
no, no Federales. Just an angry girl. True, only Freshman year. I made sure not to puke in a chick's room again. lesson learned
needless to say, we never went out, or spoke again if I remember right.
you have the better story. I just threw up all over the dorm room of the girl I really liked freshman year in college.
I'm the opposite of you, never again run and on rare occassions tequilla. :)
just got finished with a drawing and am getting ready to scan and post it. How bout you?
Listening to it right now and is very nice. Big voice such a young girl.
I say "Yay"
the piece from your post today is very cool. I think I like it cuz it's different.
ah, coffee and 'Time Out'. Very chill this New Year's Day.
envious reading all these running reports. looks like all of you had some great runs today. very cool.
getting itchy. no running this past wk & not looking good for this wk. stoopid cold!
who wants fudge? making two more batches today
am thinking a nap may be on the agenda for the afternoon
This cough is driving me insane!!! Ugh!
"@ben_8692 Get it now?
Jingle bells sung by Chewbacca. Awesome!
Not only is it Friday, it's Pumpkin Pie coffee Friday!
just reloaded my @Starbuck's card. All is right with the world.
I used to think ppl from MI didn't have an accent (other than me)but after hearing a lot MI ppl on the news lately, I have to rethink that.
Vegas and Los Angeles get snow but not MD? WTF???? My right leg for a REAL winter!
RT: hey everybody, it's @Amy_RL of Runner's Lounge. plse give her a shoutout &/or follow! Hi @Amy_RL. Getting ready to post my TIART.
Got the song "Dominick the Christmas Donkey" going through my head.
I'm here in body if not in spirit.
got up this morning and decided to go right back to bed. Stupid cold!
trying to connect our new pc to the wireless print server, I somehow change the settings so that no one can connect to it. I hate technology
out and about and am finding ppl really annoy me tonight. deep breaths count to ten
"long-haired hare" Bugs Bunny vs. the Fat Opera Singer. hilarious.
A full day of classic Looney Tunes on Cartoon Network. Nice. They're playing some really good ones.
Slept in and then took the fam out for breakfast. Very full now but it was sooo good! Happy New Year everyone.
Happy New Year, everyone. Hope it is safe, happy and healthy.
